de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.physical.model

Class Structure

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.physical.model.Structure

  • public class Structure
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure represents chemical objects in a three dimensional space. Substructures are used to partition a structure into smaller substructures that can be connected with edges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Structure()
      Creates a new empty structure.

      • addBranchSubstructure

        public void addBranchSubstructure(BranchSubstructure<?,?> branchSubstructure)
        Adds a predefined BranchSubstructure to this Structure.
        Parameters:
        branchSubstructure - The BranchSubstructure to add.

      • getAllBranches

        public java.util.List<BranchSubstructure<?,?>> getAllBranches()
        Returns all BranchSubstructures referenced in this structure. This returns also subordinate branches such as Chains or StructuralMotifs.
        Returns:
        All branch substructures.

      • getAllModels

        public java.util.List<StructuralModel> getAllModels()
        Returns all StructuralModels from this structure. In most cases this shows the same behaviour as the getBranchSubstructures() method.
        Returns:
        All models.

      • getFirstModel

        public StructuralModel getFirstModel()
        Returns an Optional of the first StructuralModel found in this structure. This should always be deterministic for christal structures. NMR structures contain several models.
        Returns:
        An Optional encapsulating the first StructuralModel found.

      • getAllChains

        public java.util.List<Chain> getAllChains()
        Returns all Chains from all models.
        Returns:
        All chains.

      • getFirstChain

        public Chain getFirstChain()
        Returns the first Chain found in this structure.
        Returns:
        The first Chain found.

      • getChain

        public java.util.Optional<Chain> getChain(java.lang.String chainIdentifier)
        Returns an Optional of the Chain with the given identifier from the first model in the structure.
        Returns:
        An Optional encapsulating the Chain found.

      • getAllLeafSubstructures

        public java.util.List<LeafSubstructure<?,?>> getAllLeafSubstructures()
        Returns all LeafSubstructures referenced anywhere in this structure.
        Returns:
        All leaf substructures.

      • getAllAminoAcids

        Returns:
        All amino acids.

        Returns all Nucleotides referenced anywhere in this structure.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        public java.util.Optional<LeafSubstructure<?,?>> getLeafSubstructure(LeafIdentifier identifier)
        Returns the leaf with the given leaf identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The leaf identifier.
        Returns:

      • getAtom

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.Map.Entry<UniqueAtomIdentifer,Atom>> getAtom(int atomSerial)
        Returns the atom with the given atom serial.

      • addPseudoAtom

        public void addPseudoAtom(java.lang.String chain,
                          java.lang.String threeLetterCode,
                          Vector3D position)
        Adds a pseudo atom (preferably for interactions) to the first model of this structure.
        Parameters:
        chain - The chain to add the atom to.
        threeLetterCode - The three letter code of the created leaf substructure.
        position - The position of the atom.
